title: New: Elvis Depressedly – Weird Honey
content:
‘if there’s a cool spot in hell / I hope you’ll get it’ Isn’t that just the ultimate declaration of modern love? Multi-talented singer songwriter Mat Cothran has released music under the Coma Cinema moniker for several years now, and whilst all the output under that moniker has been exemplary, it would be offense to simply write-off Elvis Depressedly as another side-project.

With this usual self-depreciating wit combining with a cunningly realistic sense of broken faith, Weird Honey is one of Elvis Depressedly’s finest tracks to date. Check it out.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
